# tidyspec

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of **tidyspec** is to provide a friendly pipeline for spectral analysis using the tidy data philosophy.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tidyspec from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("marceelrf/tidyspec")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example,eval=FALSE}
library(tidyspec)
## basic example code
```
